title: Lloyd Hibbert
text: Lloyd Hibbert (born 29 June 1959 in <a href="Birmingham%2C%20West%20Midlands">Birmingham</a>) is an <a href="English%20people">English</a> <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="light%20welterweight">light welter</a>/<a href="welterweight">welter</a>/<a href="light%20middleweight">light middleweight</a> <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> of the 1970s and '80s who won the <a href="British%20Boxing%20Board%20of%20Control">British Boxing Board of Control</a> (BBBofC) British light middleweight, and <a href="List%20of%20Commonwealth%20Boxing%20Council%20Champions%23light%20middleweight">Commonwealth light middleweight title</a>, and was a challenger for the BBBofC Midlands Area light middleweight title against <a href="Cliff%20Gilpin">Cliff Gilpin</a><a href="http%3A//boxrec.com/list_bouts.php%3Fhuman_id%3D17924%26amp%3Bcat%3Dboxer"></a>, his professional fighting weight varied from , i.e. <a href="light%20welterweight">light welterweight</a> to , i.e. <a href="light%20middleweight">light middleweight</a>.
